cause.description:
Although the storm was a long time ago, there is still a ridiculous amount of damage in the city that needs to be cleaned up. People don't want to just go away and let the city rot - it's their home! They need help to clean up all the residue from the storm and start rebuilding their lives.
1. The damage of Hurricane Katrina needs to be cleaned up.
2. New Orleans must be rebuilt.
3. The residents of New Orleans need help to start their lives over.
cause.mission: help the people of New Orleans clean up from the hurricane damage and help those that want to stay rebuild the city.
cause.name: Restore New Orleans and its People!
